    • How is Attention relevant in school and at home ?
AXON-School™ general overview
Home » Discover » AXON-School™ general overview

Educational teams are challenged with influencing student achievements, taking care of their physical safety and support their psychological wellbeing.

Many overlook how critically important are attentional skills in light of these challenges. Inattention for example is often mistaken for classroom boredom and likewise Impulsivity is often wrongly regarded as a behavioral problem.  

AXON-School™ aims to change the perception of attentional skills at school by helping teachers and parents alike recognize the importance of these skills and how they are reflected in each specific child. AXON-School™ utilizes a test that once taken by the children creates an attentional profile of their individual performance, highlighting important information and suggesting ways to help them learn and function better at school and at home.

AXON-School™ can provide concrete evidence to support the educational team’s professional approach; to better understand children attentional needs and facilitate a parent-teacher communication on that matter.
